input: Subject: A graceful dolphin; Characteristics: leaping out of the water; Timing and lighting: midday with sparkling sunlight; Background: clear blue sea and distant boats; Feeling: joyful and free.
coverage: A graceful dolphin leaping high out of the clear blue sea under sparkling midday sunlight, its sleek body catching the bright light as it arcs through the air. The shimmering water reflects the sunlight, with distant boats visible on the horizon. Set against a serene ocean backdrop, the image evokes a joyful and free feeling, illustrating the vibrant energy and freedom of the marine environment.
validityText:
The input does not comply with the input specification because it is structured with labeled sections (e.g., "Subject:", "Characteristics:") rather than being a single, natural language paragraph. The specification requires a natural language description intended for creating AI-generated photo prompts, and the use of labels violates the single paragraph requirement.
